1.title: Out of Order
1.plot: When the farmer gets stuck in the Loo, Bitzer has to get vital supplies to him as a matter of urgency. His is initial efforts end in failure and he drafts in Shaun and the gang to help out.

2.title: Karma Farmer
2.plot: The Farmer is stressed out and has had enough of the farm and it's inhabitants. He storms off for a break, suitcase in hand, only to reappear almost immediately, the same, but somehow different. The farm is transformed into a hippy commune where work and chores are abolished and the animals are encouraged to express themselves.

3.title: Spoilsport
3.plot: Shaun persuades Bitzer to take part in his game of Cricket but Bitzer is more worried about the condition of the pitch than the game. The resident moles, unhappy at the game taking place above their head get involved in a tit for tat with Bitzer which soon escalates to full scale war

4.title: Baad Hair Day
4.plot: The flock don't recognise Shaun when he loses one his most distinctive features. His old pal Bitzer helps him track down the lost thatch, but not before Shaun becomes very attached to one of the chickens

5.title: The Farmers Nephew
5.plot: Bitzer is left with a mountain of work when the farmer is rendered incapable. Enter the farmhand who is more interested in his mobile phone than getting the task done. Shaun and Flock ensure that their friend Bitzer gets his own 'down time'

6.title: Babysitter Bitzer
6.plot: The flock are off for a girls night night leaving Bitzer to Babysit Timmy. It's not long before the youngster makes clear who's in charge.

7.title: Dodgy Lodger
7.plot: When one of the pigs attempts to make friends with Timmy, his cohort evict him as punishment for un-pig-like behaviour. The sheep take him into the barn, and attempt to transform him into the epitome of porcine sophistication, but do they really know who they have invited into their home?

8.title: Dangerous Deliveries
8.plot: Shaun decides to take on the role of Bitzer's therapist - with disastrous consequences.

9.title: Timmy and the Dragon
9.plot: Bitzer, Shaun and Flock are convinced that a monster is at loose on the farm and hide in the barn. But what exactly is it they are afraid of?

10.title: Bitzer's New Whistle
10.plot: Bitzer thinks the future has arrived when he takes delivery of his new high tech farmyard control module but when the gadget malfunctions, Bitzer is left wishing for his old whistle

11.title: Turf Wars
11.plot: Battle ensues when the pigs muscle in on Shaun's private club and steal all the pizza. Shaun, Bitzer and the flock mount a rescue mission for Timmy who the pigs have taken hostage

12.title: A Prickly Problem
12.plot: Timmy decides to helps the hedghogs find a resting place for the night. His efforts, however, lead his weary friends into a series a scrapes rather than giving them a good night's sleep.

13.title: Wanted
13.plot: The farm is paid an unexpected visit from an escapee from the nearby prison who takes refuge in the Barn. After a short while with Shaun and the gang, though, prison doesn't seem such a bad option

14.title: Rude Dude
14.plot: An arrogant rock musician beloved by the Farmer gets stranded at the farm.

15.title: Keeping the Peace
15.plot: The farmer decides to have a lie in and Bitzer endeavors to allow him to have his lie in.

16.title: Happy Farmer's Day
16.plot: When Bitzer's pie goes missing, Bitzer makes the mistake of accepting Shaun's help.

17.title: Checklist
17.plot: Bitzer over-officious management style becomes too much for the sheep who decide it's time for him to chill out. Bitzer's tasks for the day take on a new purpose, for everyone to have some fun!

18.title: Return to Sender
18.plot: The farmer receives a mystery gift from his antipodean cousin. Unimpressed with the present, he attempts to throw it away only for it to keep reappearing. He becomes convinced it has magical powers

19.title: Cone of Shame
19.plot: Bitzer is an all too willing invalid when he has to wear the cone of shame and is happy to let the flock wait on him. That is, until Shaun rumbles his malingering and plots the pooch's comeuppance

20.title: Sheep Farmer
20.plot: Timmy sees a particularly grumpy farmer giving one of the flock a hard time.

1.title: Off the Baa!
1.plot: The flock play a game of football with a cabbage.

2.title: Bathtime
2.plot: The flock seek out hot water for their bath.

3.title: Shape Up with Shaun
3.plot: The flock helps Shirley get in shape.

4.title: Timmy in a Tizzy
4.plot: Baby Timmy is in a tizzy over his missing teddy bear.

5.title: Scrumping
5.plot: The sheep try to get apples from the the tree in the pig's pen.

6.title: Still Life
6.plot: The sheep help the farmer paint a picture.

8.title: Take Away
8.plot: The sheep get take out pizza.

9.title: The Bull
9.plot: 5 The Bull - When a bull wanders into the sheep's field, Shaun finds out it's a bad idea to make him 'see red'. But then the Naughty Pigs pour some red paint into the sheep dip... 14 Scrumping - Shaun's attempts to get his hands on some apples from a tree overhanging the Naughty Pigs' yard soon escalates into all-out war between sheep and pigs. 15 Saturday Night Shaun - Shaun finds the Farmer's old record player on the dump and organizes a rave in the barn. But trouble looms when the Naughty Pigs gate-crash the party...

10.title: Saturday Night Shaun
10.plot: Shaun uses the Farmer's old record player for a dance party. The pigs interrupt the party, annoying Bitzer.

11.title: The Kite
11.plot: The flock has fun with a kite that has come into the field.

12.title: Little Sheep of Horrors
12.plot: Timmy ventures into the Farmer's house to watch a horror movie. The sheep collaborate to fetch Timmy home, mystifying the Farmer.

13.title: Buzz Off Bees
13.plot: The sheep discover a mysterious buzzing object in their field. Shaun investigates and finds it's full of bees, who make the flock's life a misery.

14.title: Fleeced
14.plot: It is haircut day for the flock, but the Farmer's styling attempts inspire the flock to make a break for it.

15.title: Shaun Shoots the Sheep
15.plot: The sheep have fun with an instant camera.

16.title: Big Top Timmy
16.plot: The sheep visit a carnival in the next field.

17.title: Fetching
17.plot: Bitzer's infatuation with a female dog distracts him from minding the rowdy flock. Shaun tries to get Bitzer to focus.

18.title: Mountains Out of Molehills
18.plot: The sheep have a mole problem.

19.title: Who's the Mummy?
19.plot: A quartet of chick hatchlings bond to Shaun, thinking he's their mother. After a while, Shaun can't get rid of them fast enough.

20.title: Things That Go Bump
20.plot: Bumps in the night disturb the flock's sleep. Shaun and Bitzer investigate, and the culprits are soon discovered.

21.title: Abracadabra
21.plot: The farmer throws away his old magic set.

22.title: Sheep on the Loose
22.plot: The sheep go for a day out.

23.title: Washday
23.plot: The farmer does his weekly wash.

24.title: The Visitor
24.plot: The sheep get an out of this world visitor.

25.title: Shaun the Farmer
25.plot: The Farmer has a cold, so Shaun takes over.

27.title: Bitzer Puts His Foot in It
27.plot: The Farmer wants to build a new shed.

29.title: If You Can't Stand the Heat

31.title: Tidy Up
31.plot: There is a mess in the field.

37.title: Heavy Metal Shaun
37.plot: The Farmer gets a new metal detector.

38.title: Snore Worn Shaun
38.plot: Shaun is kept awake by Shirley's snoring.

39.title: Shaun Encounters
39.plot: When a strange space craft crash-lands on the farm, Shaun and co. help its little green occupant get air-borne again./ When the Farmer decides to throw out his magic set, Shaun decides to put on a show Â- but things get out of hand when the flock start disappearing./ Two alien kids land at the farm one night and run riot. Can Shaun and Bitzer stop them before they wake the Farmer.

40.title: Save the Tree
40.plot: The Farmer wants to chop down the tree.

1.title: Double Trouble
1.plot: Shaun dresses up as the farmer.

2.title: Draw the Line
2.plot: The flock hijack a road line-painting machine and cause chaos while creating giant works of art in the field. However, will farmer appreciate their art?

3.title: Sheepless Nights
3.plot: A leak in the barn roof sends the sheep to bunk with the pigs.

4.title: Spring Lamb
4.plot: Shaun must catch a springy Timmy.

6.title: Who's the Caddy?
6.plot: The sheep play a round of golf.

7.title: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow
7.plot: Shaun borrows the farmer's hairpiece, with unfortunate results.

8.title: Bagpipe Buddy
8.plot: The sheep find a bagpipe that they believe is a sick bird.

9.title: Supersize Timmy
9.plot: Timmy gets super-big after eating a tomato grown with special fertilizer.

10.title: Lock Out
10.plot: The farmer gets locked out of the house.

11.title: Cheetah Cheater
11.plot: 11 Cheetah CheaterA wildlife film inspires Pidsley the cat to play a prank on the flock by disguising himself as a leopard. Shaun is convinced there is a huge beast on the loose and concocts a plan to catch it.21 The BoatThe Farmer gets Bitzer to help him renovate an old boat, but as soon as his back is turned the sheep and pigs turn the refurbishment into a swashbuckling game of pirates.31 The MagpieA magpie has nested in the big tree and is causing chaos by stealing everything around the farm. The magpie's nest soon begins to fill up with loot and Shaun has to come ...

12.title: Ewe've Been Framed
12.plot: 12 Ewe've Been FramedWhen Shaun accidentally breaks the Farmer's glasses, he and Bitzer have their work cut out trying to prevent their short-sighted master from having mishaps around the farm. Things get a little hair-raising for the flock before Shaun manages to replace the smashed up spectacles.32 Operation PidsleyWhile the farmer is away on a night out, the sheep sneak into the farmhouse for a party. But when Pidsley snaps a photograph of the fun and games, Shaun and Bitzer need to catch the malicious cat before he can show the incriminating evidence to the Farmer...

13.title: Bitzer's New Hat
13.plot: The Farmer gives Bitzer a horrible new hat. Bitzer is very upset as he treasured his old hat. The flock rally round to try and cheer him up with a selection of dashing alternative head-gear. Meanwhile, Shaun heads off on an adventure to find out what the Farmer did with the old one.

14.title: Hide and Squeak
14.plot: A cute mouse appears in the farmhouse and terrorises the Farmer. Pidsley the cat is ordered to dispose of the rodent. When the mouse takes refuge in Shaun's fleece, the flock persuade him to protect their new friend from the pitiless cat.

15.title: Frantic Romantic
15.plot: The farmer tries to impress his new girlfriend with dinner at the farm.

16.title: Everything Must Go
16.plot: The Farmer has set up a stall by the side of the road, selling produce from the garden. He leaves Bitzer in charge for the day. But lazy Bitzer soon gets bored and gives Shaun the job while he puts his feet up by the pool. Shaun proves to be a much better salesman than Bitzer and flock are only too happy to get stuck in, selling pretty much all the Farmer's worldly possessions!

17.title: Party Animals
17.plot: The Farmer is throwing a fancy-dress house party for his birthday. Bitzer is entrusted with posting the invites but fools around on the way to the post box and loses them all! Shaun saves the day again - disguised in their own ingenious costumes, the sheep stand in as the guests and have a right old knees-up. But can they fool the Farmer into believing he is surrounded by his friends?

18.title: Cat Got Your Brain?
18.plot: Two bungling alien scientists transport Pidsley and Shaun aboard their flying saucer. Unfortunately, a foolish error causes the aliens to swap the animal's brains around. Shaun and Pidsley are dumped back to Earth, not realising they are in the wrong bodies - leading to much confusion around the farm before the aliens return to correct their mistake.

19.title: Two's Company
19.plot: A bedraggled new sheep lands amongst the flock. After a wash in the sheep dip, the new comer turns out to be quite attractive and Shaun immediately falls head over hoof for her. The flock are kept amused by Shaun's romantic antics, while Bitzer goes on a journey to find her rightful owner.

20.title: In the Doghouse
20.plot: When Bitzer's kennel is accidentally destroyed, he hopes the Farmer will replace it with a new deluxe model. But when he sees his master's clumsy attempt to build a new kennel, Bitzer is so horrified he packs his bags and leaves home. Shaun hopes to tempt Bitzer to return with the kennel of his dreams.

21.title: The Boat
21.plot: The Farmer gets Bitzer to help him renovate an old boat, but as soon as his back is turned the sheep and pigs turn the refurbishment into a swashbuckling game of pirates.

22.title: What's Up, Dog?
22.plot: A wayward balloonist lands in the sheep's field. Shaun and his friends are intrigued by the hot air balloon and inadvertently take to the skies. Down on the ground an ever more desperate Bitzer runs himself ragged attempting to bring the wayward sheep back down to Earth safely.

23.title: Cock a Doodle Shaun
23.plot: The cockerel is missing and there's no one to wake up the farm. When Shaun discovers the cockerel has been snatched by the greedy fox, he sets off with Bitzer on a daring rescue mission. Will they get the cockerel back in time to wake up the rest of the farm?

24.title: Bitzer's Basic Training
24.plot: Bitzer thinks The Farmer is planning to replace him, so Shaun helps to knock his friend into shape. Unfortunately Bitzer goes completely over the top with his training regime and starts running the farm with military precision driving everyone crazy.

25.title: Chip Off the Old Block
25.plot: The farmer drops a slab of stone on Timmy's teddy. Shaun and the flock must recover the toy.

26.title: Pig Trouble
26.plot: The farmer lets the pigs run the farm, which upsets the sheep. Shaun puts things right.

27.title: Bitzer from the Black Lagoon
27.plot: Bitzer falls into a pond and comes out covered in mud. Shaun thinks it is an attacking monster.

28.title: Zebra Ducks of the Serengeti
28.plot: Two ducks get covered in soot and are mistaken for rare African Zebra Ducks.

29.title: Whistleblower
29.plot: Bitzer loses his precious whistle and tests out a trumpet as a replacement. The noise drives the flock insane.

30.title: The Big Chase
30.plot: Timmy drives off on the farmer's new quad bike; Shaun and the flock give chase to return it before the farmer finds out.

31.title: The Magpie
31.plot: A magpie has built a nest in the big tree and is stealing items around the farm and keeping them in the nest.

32.title: Operation Pidsley
32.plot: Pidsley films the flock having a party in the farmer's house. Shaun and Bitzer must stop him showing the pictures to the farmer.

33.title: Pigs Swill Fly
33.plot: A fight breaks out between the pigs and the sheep just as the farm inspector is visiting.

34.title: Shirley Whirley
34.plot: Overweight sheep Shirley is given wheels so Shaun can move her around easily, but the farmers TV remote interferes with the signal.

35.title: Foxy Laddie
35.plot: A fox arrives at the farm intent on eating Timmy. It disguises itself as a ram but Shaun sees through the disguise, and the fox gets its just desserts.

36.title: Shaun Goes Potty
36.plot: The farmer has a new pool table, but Shaun, Bitzer and the flock play on it and accidentally damage it.

37.title: An Ill Wind
37.plot: The farmer builds his own wind turbine to reduce his electricity bill. Shaun an the flock turn it into a fairground ride and wreck it in the process.

38.title: Fireside Favourite
38.plot: Bitzer has a cold so is indoors in front of the fire; the cat Pidsley is outraged his warm spot has been taken.

39.title: Snowed In
39.plot: It has snowed heavily overnight. The sheep have a massive snowball fight while the farmer is trapped in the farmhouse by a snowdrift.

40.title: We Wish Ewe a Merry Christmas
40.plot: The animals decorate the farmhouse to cheer up the farmer who will be alone for Christmas.

0.title: Championsheeps
0.plot: Life on the farm becomes a hive of athletic activity as Shaun and friends stage their very own sporting extravaganza. In heroic style Shaun, Bitzer and friends compete for victory in 21 events; twirling, racing, bouncing, diving & leaping to success whenever the FarmerâEUR(TM)s back is turned.

1.title: The Stand Off
1.plot: A traffic jam occurs on the road and Shaun and the flock can't get past. Bitzer decides to let them walk through a truck, but they don't come out the other side.

2.title: The Coconut
2.plot: The farmer wins a coconut from a carnival. Shaun and Bitzer get their hands on it and attempt to crack it open.

3.title: The Shepherd
3.plot: The farmer enters a shepherd contest to try and earn a trophy. Will Timmy's interfering stop him from winning?

4.title: You Missed a Bit
4.plot: Window-cleaning proves to be a lot harder than it's thought to be for Shaun and Bitzer.

5.title: Let's Spray
5.plot: Graffiti art gets Bitzer into trouble.

6.title: The Crow
6.plot: A crow in the barn prevents Shaun and the flock from sleeping.

7.title: Shaun the Fugitive
7.plot: After Shaun is caught eating cakes, an engineer arrives. Shaun thinks he's after him, so he goes into hiding. Will he survive?

8.title: Hard to Swallow
8.plot: Shaun quits baaing but goes quacking today.

9.title: Mission Inboxible
9.plot: The Farmer is engrossed in trying to set up his new computer. The Flock take the opportunity of his back being turned to have a game of football. When the ball accidentally lands inside the farmhouse, under the nose of The Farmer, Shaun comes up with an ingenious disguise to help him retrieve it.

10.title: Bye Bye Barn
10.plot: Shaun and The Flock discover that The Farmer has grand plans for their barn - that don't include them. Drastic action is needed if life on the farm is ever going to be the same again.

11.title: The Rounders Match
11.plot: Tensions are high during a game of rounders.

12.title: Film Night
12.plot: Shaun and Bitzer watch clips from old episodes.

13.title: Fossils
13.plot: Shaun and the flock help Bitzer put together hidden treasure.

14.title: The Skateboard
14.plot: Shaun decides he wants to have a go at skateboarding - and of course there's trouble.

15.title: The Piano
15.plot: The Farmer is playing the piano and torturing everyone with his musical inability. When The Flock discover that Bitzer on the other hand is a virtuoso they decide it's time for a party. They devise a plan to 'borrow' the piano when The Farmer goes to bed - however things don't quite go to plan .

16.title: The Snapshot
16.plot: Shaun is accidentally cut out of the Farmer's family photo.

17.title: Prickly Heat
17.plot: It is a scorching hot day on the farm and the flock need to cool off, but can't go into the sheep dip. Bitzer finds an inflatable swimming pool, and then must help keep the Farmer cool, leading the flock to investigate the swimming pool.

18.title: The Hang Glider
18.plot: The Farmer has a thrilling new hobby - however it's not as easy as it looks. When The Farmer gets stuck in a tree Bitzer comes to his rescue, leaving Shaun and The Flock to get to grips with the airborne contraption.

19.title: The Shadow Play
19.plot: After failing to comfort an upset Timmy, the shadow puppet crew spring into action.

20.title: Bull vs. Wool
20.plot: Bitzer's antics with a red napkin at a picnic attract the attention of the bull.

1.title: Cones
1.plot: The flock divert an ice cream van into their field.

2.title: Caught Short Alien
2.plot: Shaun's old friend the Alien drops by for a loo break.

3.title: Happy Birthday Timmy!
3.plot: It's Timmy's birthday and the flock throw him a party.

4.title: The Genie
4.plot: Shaun dreams of a life in the fast-lane.

5.title: 3DTV
5.plot: The Farmer is very excited by his new purchase - a 3D TV.

6.title: The Smelly Farmer
6.plot: Shaun, Bitzer and the flock decide to give the Farmer a wash.

7.title: DIY
7.plot: Bitzer is left in charge of decorating and calls on the flock for help.

8.title: The Rabbit
8.plot: The Farmer's niece has come to visit, bringing her precious pet rabbit.

9.title: Prize Possession
9.plot: The Farmer can't believe his luck - he has a winning ticket.

10.title: The Spider
10.plot: Bitzer's plans are rudely disturbed by a persistent insect.

11.title: The Looney Tic
11.plot: Shaun tries to find out what is causing Bitzer and the flock's strange behaviour.

12.title: Men at Work
12.plot: The Flock have some fun with a water leak.

13.title: The Dog Show
13.plot: The Farmer enters Bitzer in a dog show.

14.title: Missing Piece
14.plot: Shaun comes across a discarded jigsaw puzzle.

15.title: Wildlife Watch
15.plot: A film crew arrives to record a rare bird.

16.title: The Pelican
16.plot: An unusual guest lands on the farm.

17.title: Bad Boy
17.plot: There's a new kid on the block and he's up to no good.

18.title: Remote Control
18.plot: Bitzer is sent to fix the faulty TV aerial and asks the flock for help.

19.title: Phoney Farmer
19.plot: The Farmer is off on holiday, but his replacement is only interested in himself.

20.title: Ground Dog Day
20.plot: Bitzer struggles to finish his list of chores before the ice cream van arrives.

21.title: The Intruder
21.plot: When the Farmer tasks Bitzer with ridding the Farm of a pesky Crow, Shaun comes up with an ingenious disguise to fool the intruder. However, the plan backfires when he's suspected of being the crazed Chicken thief of Mossybottom Farm.

22.title: Bitzer for a Day
22.plot: When the Farmer decides it's time he and Bitzer head out for a bit of Man and Dog time, Shaun seizes his chance to take charge. He soon discovers the job is not quite as easy as he first thought.

23.title: Bitzer's Secret
23.plot: The Farmer decides it's time to get fit - and calls on Bitzer to join him. Bitzer has other ideas and comes up with a secret plan to avoid putting in the hard work. Will his scheme catch up with him in the end?

24.title: Ping-Pong Poacher
24.plot: With the animals of Mossybottom Farm keenly watching 'Shaun vs Bitzer' in the greatest table tennis match of all time, they fail to notice a hungry Fox who isn't keeping his eye on the ball at all.

25.title: Hidden Talents
25.plot: It's a quiet day and the Flock decide to entertain each other by performing their favourite party tricks. However, when the Farmer tries to join in, things get a little awkward.

26.title: Picture Perfect
26.plot: After completing all of his tasks, Bitzer is shocked to find the state of the barn and decides to help by tidying up. He has a lot of difficulty trying to rehang a perpetually tilting picture, until the flock come up with their own solution.

27.title: Save the Dump
27.plot: The Farmer decides to build a golf course on the farm to impress the local Squire. When the Flock discover they'll lose their beloved dump, they need to come up with an imaginative solution to try and save it.

28.title: Duck!
28.plot: When Shaun and the Flock discover that a pair of nesting Ducks has stolen their bedding to make a comfy new home up on top of Bitzer's kennel, the battle is on to set things straight.

29.title: The Stare
29.plot: Bitzer gets his wish for some peace & quiet when Shaun becomes hypnotised by Mowermouth the goat and finally stops bothering him. But with the whole Flock under the influence of Mowermouth's powerful gaze, Bitzer soon realises just how much he needs his old buddy.

30.title: Fruit and Nuts
30.plot: Tired of eating grass, Shaun sets out to pinch one of the Farmer's prized apples only to have every attempt ruined by his constantly sneezing accomplice - a Sheep, who much to Shaun's frustration, has decided to be his new best friend.

imdb.plot outline: Shaun is a sheep who doesn't follow the flock - in fact, he leads them into all sorts of scrapes and scraps, turning peace in the valley into mayhem in the meadow. Shaun and his pals run rings around their poor sheepdog Bitzer, as he tries to stop the Farmer finding out what's going on behind his back. Every day brings a new adventure for Shaun.
imdb.title: Shaun the Sheep
plot: Shaun is a sheep who doesn't follow the flock - in fact, he leads them into all sorts of scrapes and scraps, turning peace in the valley into mayhem in the meadow. Shaun and his pals run rings around their poor sheepdog Bitzer, as he tries to stop the Farmer finding out what's going on behind his back. Every day brings a new adventure for Shaun.::Inman
